mapper.select: select * from schedule where 1=1 and jobno=#{jobno} order by startdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into schedule ( SNO,TYPE,TITLE, STARTDATE,ENDDATE,ALLDAY, URL,MANAGER,DNO,JOBNO, CLASSNAME, backgroundColor,borderColor,textColor ) values( to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || schedule_seq.NEXTVAL,#{type},#{title}, #{startdate},#{enddate},#{allday}, #{url},#{manager},#{dno},#{jobno}, #{className}, #{backgroundColor},#{borderColor},#{textColor} )
mapper.update: update schedule set TYPE=#{type},TITLE=#{title}, STARTDATE=#{startdate},ENDDATE=#{enddate},ALLDAY=#{allday}, URL=#{url},MANAGER=#{manager},DNO=#{dno},JOBNO=#{jobno}, CLASSNAME=#{className}, backgroundColor=#{backgroundColor},borderColor=#{borderColor},textColor=#{textColor} where sno=#{sno}
mapper.select: select title,jobno,substr(startdate,7,2) as day,type from schedule where startdate>=#{startYM} and startdate<#{endYM} and type in ('1','2','3') and substr(startdate,9,4)!='0000' order by jobno asc, startdate asc
